effect.name: Background Offset stationary parameter
effect.description:
Offsets the background using a texture parameter (Red for X, Green for Y).
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:55
effect.author: Looki & pixelthief

parameter.name: Width
parameter.description: Width of the shift in pixels.

parameter.name: Height
parameter.description: Height of the shift in pixels.

parameter.name: Xoffset
parameter.description: Height of the shift in pixels.

parameter.name: Yoffset
parameter.description: Height of the shift in pixels.

parameter.name: Texture Width
parameter.description: Width of the texture parameter in pixels.

parameter.name: Texture Height
parameter.description: Height of the texture parameter in pixels.

parameter.name: Subsampling
parameter.description: Sample neighboring pixels to smoothen the distortion.

parameter.name: X Bias
parameter.description: 1 = Distortion only towards the right, -1 = only towards left.

parameter.name: Y Bias
parameter.description: 1 = Distortion only towards the bottom, -1 = only towards top.
